content: Add a dark mode that gets used if the user's machines set in dark mode
The boxes on the screen are all white with a dark background. Make the boxes on the screen a slightly lighter shade of the background.
Now do the same for the message boxes. The light blue boxes in dark mode could be a little darker than the background.
Ok now style the code blocks and the send message box for dark mode. Make sure they are unchanged in light mode.
Looks great in light mode. In dark mode, make code block have the same background color os the parent with a subtle border. Make the border of the input box match that border color.
Get File Diff popup looking good in dark mode (no change in light mode)
In dark mode, make the Tips box have the same background as the other boxes.
